title: How should I respond to compliments from males?
body:
Since I am a very pretty girl gamer males compliment me on a regular basis, but when I respond with something like "I know!" or "Yes!", they start to get angry and verbally rape me.
What am I supposed to do? Not respond at all?

And here's a selfie if you dont believe that I'm pretty.

Oh and its just like on here http://www.buzzfeed.com/rossalynwarren/this-is-what-happens-when-women-actually-accept-a-compliment#.pa6bZOGeo

*Riven Lovejoy, Professional female gamer, Feminist, Promoter of Equality, Love and Peace.*
